title: ECS System Meta-Schema
description: Schema for defining ECS Systems - Temporal activities / business logic units that read and write entities

title.description: Human-readable name for the system (e.g., FatesGate)

description.description: Human-readable description of the system's purpose

dispatch.description: Event-driven dispatch rules with CEL routing logic

input_key.description: Key in the inputs map that defines the schema for this trigger

output.description: Output specification for this dispatch rule

timeout.description: Activity timeout (string for config:// or CEL expressions)

retries.description: Retry count or config:// reference (integer for direct value, string for config://)

inputs.description: Input schema definitions keyed by input_key for dispatch rules

additionalProperties.description: Reference to the input schema for this key

output.description: Default output schema (used when dispatch rules don't specify output)

default_node.description: Default node that executes this system (used when routing_policy doesn't specify a pool)

default_queue.description: Default queue for this system (used when dispatch rules don't specify output queue)

x-familiar-pgo.description: Profile-Guided Optimization configuration for performance-critical systems

enabled.description: Whether PGO is enabled for this system (should be true for hot paths)

priority.description: PGO priority level - affects build time and optimization aggressiveness

workload_samples.description: References to representative workload samples for PGO training

$ref.description: Reference to a workload sample JSON file

weight.description: Relative weight of this sample in the training set

optimization_goal.description: Primary optimization goal for this system's workload

sample_count.description: Number of workload samples to use (config:// reference)

warmup_iterations.description: Number of warmup iterations before profiling (config:// reference)

profile_retention_days.description: Days to retain PGO profiles before expiration (config:// reference)

instrumentation_flags.description: Additional Rust compiler flags for instrumentation

profile_cache.description: Profile caching configuration to avoid redundant sampling

ttl_days.description: How long to cache profiles before re-sampling (config:// reference)

invalidate_on_schema_change.description: Invalidate profile cache when system schema changes

performance_targets.description: Performance targets that must be met with PGO optimization
